title: Swelling Test Data Schema
description: A swelling test is a series of constant composition expansion tests, in which an increasing amount of gas is added to a fluid sample at a fixed temperature. In each step measurements for saturation pressure, volume, density and others are taken.

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Samples Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

TestTemperature.title: Test Temperature
TestTemperature.description: The recorded temperature within the test environment.

TestSteps.title: Test Steps
TestSteps.description: The individual pressure steps of the swelling test.

items.title: Test Steps
items.description: The individual pressure steps of the swelling test.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: Internal step number which identifies the sequence of step in swelling measurements

SaturationPressure.title: Saturation Pressure
SaturationPressure.description: The saturation (or bubble point) pressure measured in this test step.

SaturationPressureTypeID.title: Saturation Pressure Type ID
SaturationPressureTypeID.description:
Pb (Bubble Point)/Pd (Dew Point)/2-Ph (Two Phase)

Convert to reference list SaturationPressureType

SwellingFactor.title: Swelling Factor
SwellingFactor.description: Swelling Factor is a relative volume measurement used to quantify how the volume of a reservoir rock or fluid changes in response to the introduction of different fluids or under varying pressure and temperature conditions.

DensityAtSaturationPressure.title: Density At Saturation Pressure
DensityAtSaturationPressure.description: The density of the sample fluid at the saturation pressure of this test step.

GasOilRatio.title: Gas Oil Ratio
GasOilRatio.description: The ratio of the volumes of gas to oil in the sample.

CumulativeGasToOriginalFluidMolePercent.title: Cumulative Gas To Original Fluid Mole Percent
CumulativeGasToOriginalFluidMolePercent.description: The cumulative molar percentage of gas to the original fluid.

CumulativeGasOfTotalFluidMolePercent.title: Cumulative Gas Of Total Fluid Mole Percent
CumulativeGasOfTotalFluidMolePercent.description: The cumulative molar percentage of gas to the total fluid.

IsothermalCompressibilityAtSaturationPre.title: Isothermal Compressibility At Saturation Pressure
IsothermalCompressibilityAtSaturationPre.description: The isothermal compressibility measured at the saturation pressure for this step.

ViscosityAtSaturationPressure.title: Viscosity At Saturation Pressure
ViscosityAtSaturationPressure.description: The viscosity of the fluid at the saturation pressure of the test step.

TransportTestID.title: Transport Test ID
TransportTestID.description: Identifier for a specific transport test (if any) that contributed to this swelling test.

ConstantCompositionExpansionID.title: Constant Composition Expansion ID
ConstantCompositionExpansionID.description: Identifier for a specific constant composition expansion test (if any) that contributed to this swelling test.

AtmosphericFlashAndCompositionalAnalysis.title: Atmospheric Flash And Compositional Analysis ID
AtmosphericFlashAndCompositionalAnalysis.description: Identifier for a specific atmospheric flash or compositional analysis that contributed to this swelling test.

InjectedGas.title: Injected Gas
InjectedGas.description: An array object capturing the composition and other properties of the injected gas.

items.title: Injected Gas
items.description: An array object capturing the composition of the vapor.

ComponentNameID.title: Component Name ID
ComponentNameID.description: Name of the component in the liquid.

RelativeMoleWeight.title: Relative Mole Weight
RelativeMoleWeight.description: Molar mass relative to other components.

MolecularWeight.title: Molecular Weight
MolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the component.

MolePercent.title: Mole Percent
MolePercent.description: The molar percentage of the component, if available.
MolePercent.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

MassPercent.title: Mass Percent
MassPercent.description: The mass percentage of the component, if available.

VolumePercent.title: Volume Percent
VolumePercent.description: The volume percentage of the component, if available.

SpecificGravity.title: Specific Gravity
SpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component.
